title: My League of Legends is stuck at 51% at applying patches.
body: My League of Legends is stuck at 51% at applying patches. It has been doing this for close to 15 hours. I've had it installing over night and over a 7 hour school day. If there is any fix to this please help as soon as possible I will try anything at this point.. I really would love to play once again and I'm scared I won't be able to.

replies.body:
This specific issue happens if your connection to the Patching Servers is unstable, causing the patcher to miss files in the download process. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if this helped.

So, it's my internet? Huh, so why is it I just reinstalled csgo in under 20 minutes? Ever since patch 6.20 this game has been going downhill, very unstable, and you guys try to blame it on the consumers internet, that's laughable, I used to have 220 fps and 32 ping every game, after patch 6.20 I get 60 fps max and 49 ping, but hey, must be my internet, the one thing that's been a constant and hasn't been changed, not the game right? Been sitting at 58% "applying patches" for over 6 hours, this isn't my internet, it's the crappy client.
Yikes is this guy not reliable orrrrr what's going on ? @SkankHunt

For the 5th time now I have restarted the entire installing and now It's moving at 33% but it takes hours on end to even go up 5 % which again  I have NEVER had this issue before.
